item.title: Trump names Michael Selig to chair CFTC; Selig cites crypto capital goal
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has picked Michael Selig as the Commodity Futures Trading Commission's chair, an administration official and Selig himself...

item.title: Trump slaps 10% extra tariff on Canada over Reagan trade ad
item.description: President Donald Trump is imposing an extra 10% tariff on Canadian imports for what he says is a misleading TV ad featuring former President Ronald Re...

item.title: Timothy Mellon is Trump's $130 million mystery military donor: NYT
item.description: Reclusive billionaire Timothy Mellon, whose grandfather was a Treasury secretary, was a top donor to President Donald Trump for the 2024 election.

item.title: Trump aims to clinch deal with China's Xi during Asia trip
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump will test his deal-making capabilities on a trip to Asia, while doubts hang over his meeting with China's Xi Jinping.

item.title: U.S. to escalate military presence in South America with aircraft carrier group
item.description: The U.S. escalated a military buildup in the Caribbean on Friday by deploying the Gerald Ford aircraft carrier group to Latin America.
